features: FORMULATED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN this dermatologist & allergy tested, fragrance-free, super gentle face wash uses vegan ceramides to support your skin’s barrier, while removing makeup, oil and impurities
SULFATE-FREE light foaming cleanser harnesses the power of plants and phytonutrients to gently cleanse without stripping your beautiful skin
VEGAN CERAMIDES our vegan blend is a plant-based lipid concentrate that your skin recognizes and uses to help restore the protective barrier function of the skin
FREE OF HARSH CHEMICALS Formulated without parabens, phthalates, SLS, or mineral oil.
BETTER PACKAGING this pretty tube is made from fully recyclable sugar cane bio-resin. Give it another life and recycle it again!
100% VEGAN AND CRUELTY-FREE safe for the planet, animals, and you!
body.description: Barrier care just got better. Formulated for sensitive skin, this dermatologist-tested, fragrance-free, super gentle face wash uses vegan ceramides to support your skin’s barrier, while removing makeup, oil and impurities. This sulfate-free light foaming cleanser harnesses the power of plants and phytonutrients to gently cleanse without stripping your beautiful skin. Marshmallow root extract & calendula help calm & soothe.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #30,714 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #465 in Facial Cleansing Washes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like a foamier cleanser usually, but this leaves my skin feeling so nice and comfortable I fell in love with it. There is some sudsing, just not a lot. It doesn't strip the skin, no fragrance (5 stars for not having scent!), not irritating at all on my sensitive skin. I am over 40, have rosacea and normal to dry sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for sensitive skin and makeup remover!
reviews.reviewText: My skin is very very very sensitive!!! This face wash has not once irritated my skin, I wear waterproof mascara all the time for work (I work outdoors)My waterproof mascara is hard to take off even with makeup removers, this face wash will immediately take it off!!! Which is crazy because I’ve tried so many makeup removers and they just wont do justice on taking off my waterproof mascara. This facewash will completely take it off!It doesn’t have a scent which I love. This face wash how ever doesn’t bubble up as much but im sure is because this is more for sensitive skin so is doing good for your skin if anything!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: I love that this is cruelty free. It removes makeup well and the scent doesn't bother my allergies. Its just too drying for me. I have dry or combo skin and this leaves my skin feeling dry and tight. This is better for people with oily skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only cleanser I'll use now!
reviews.reviewText: I have been in the process of transitioning to all vegan &cruelty free skin care/hygiene products, and of course love Pacifica because they are an all vegan and cruelty-free brand. I have extremely acne prone skin and have to avoid a lot of comedogenic ingredients that are in basically everything it seems. I wanted a basic cleanser with no fragrance with ceramides for barrier repair/ protection and this does the trick. My favorite part is the consistency of the cleanser; its almost like a gel but also has a very light cream-like consistency at the same time. Feels so good and light on the skin but gives a very good clean. I don't wear makeup so I can't speak for its make-up removing properties, but my number one take away is that it's a vegan product and doesn't cause acne. A total win for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm so glad I found this brand, and perfurably this face cleanser!! Work great on my extremely sensitive skin! Everything I've used always made my skin tight and itchy!! Well not this one.... my face feels squeaky clean. I will continue to use this product! I love it!!! Better yet my face loves it. 😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Cleanser Ever!
reviews.reviewText: My favorite cleanser. Feels great, foams up nicely, doesn't leave the skin stripped, clean and vegan, and made in USA 💜

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars l love this!
reviews.reviewText: I used another brand that was a bit more expensive and this is even better. Very moisturizing and easy on y sensitive skin. Nice packaging. Looks pretty on my sink!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works really well. I love how clean my face feels after washing it. No tightness or dry feeling at all. Well balanced ph.

reviews.reviewTitle: Its very soft and removes make-up so well.
reviews.reviewText: I like how soft for the skin especially when removing make-up. I also love that it does not dries my skin since I have a dry skin type.
